definition[0]: an organization that consists of a group of people who have the same aims, do the same kind of work etc
definition[1]: a relationship with a particular person, organization, group etc
example[1]: his close association with the Green Party
definition[2]: a connection or relationship between two events, ideas, situations etc
example[2]: the strong association between the disease and middle-aged women
definition[3]: a feeling or memory that is related to a particular place, event, word etc
example[3]: Scotland has all kinds of happy associations for me.
definition[4]: a group of people or organizations who have the same aims or do the same kind of work
example[4]: the National Association of Purchasing Managers
